title.native: 勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種の猫耳少女と出会う
title.romaji: Yuusha Party wo Tsuihou Sareta Beast Tamer, Saikyoushu no Nekomimi Shoujo to Deau

description: Because Rain was a weak and simple beast tamer, he was expelled from the hero's group but that didn't stop his desire to be an adventurer. By taking simple quests afterwards he has a destined encounter with a strong cat girl.
synonyms: เทมเมอร์ถูกทิ้งกับสาวหูแมวสุดแกร่ง
Penjinak Binatang yang Ditendang dari Regu Pahlawan Bertemu Gadis Bertelinga Hewan dari Ras Terkuat

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

title.native: 勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種の猫耳少女と出会う
勇者パーティーを追放されたビーストテイマー、最強種の猫耳少女と出会う

name.native: ステラ・エンプレイス
アリオス・オーランド
エドガー・フロムウェア

node.description:
__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)

[Twitter (Alisa Okehazama)](https://twitter.com/aliiisa_ok) | [Twitter (Alisa Fukami)](https://twitter.com/alisa_024) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/%E6%A1%B6%E7%8B%AD%E9%96%93%E3%81%82%E3%82%8A%E3%81%95-100315608634523/) | [SoundCloud (Alisa Fukami)](https://soundcloud.com/alisafukami) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/6VMGyvtQPQ1uPvkaSm73aR?si=NT2wdnG2Sy60driRfdIQdw) | [AppleMusic](https://music.apple.com/jp/artist/alisa-okehazama/1548614368) | [Blog](https://profiee.com/i/alisa_oke) | [Weibo](http://weibo.com/okehazama)

Alisa Okehazama, alternatively known as Alisa Fukami is a Japanese composer and arranger
_Note: Not to be confused with either the [scriptwriter](https://anilist.co/staff/118512/) or [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/218342/) by the same name._

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MADKID_official)

MADKID (マッドキッド), formerly known as J-BOYS-5, is a Japanese vocal and dance boy group formed on July 20, 2014. Currently, they consist of 3 vocals and 2 rappers.
In 2018 they made their major-label debut under Nippon Columbia.

Current Members:
* [YOU-TA (ゆーた)](https://anilist.co/staff/270066/YOUTA) (Leader; joined September 2014)
* KAZUKI (かずき)
* SHIN (しん) (Joined February 1, 2017)
* [LIN (りん)](https://anilist.co/staff/270067/LIN)
* [YUKI (ゆき)](https://anilist.co/staff/270070/YUKI)

Former Members:
* KENTO (Leader; left September 2014; now member of IVVY as KENTO.i)
* RIKITO (Left May 2015)
* CASEY (Joined in summer 2015, left January 2016)

__Height:__ 158 cm
__Agency:__ Aoni Production

[Profile (Aoni)](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/kohno-marika.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/marika_0222) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marika_kohno/) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marika_Kouno) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高野麻里佳)

She is part of the seiyuu idol group [**Earphones**](https://anilist.co/staff/195973/) (イヤホンズ) with fellow voice actresses [Rie Takahashi](https://anilist.co/staff/119331) and [Yuki Nagaku](https://anilist.co/staff/119370), originally formed for the anime [Sore ga Seiyuu!](https://anilist.co/anime/21009).

**Non-anime roles:**
• Primavera - Memento Mori (VG)
